EmailTemplate.description: this template is used to send email to end user when he gets access to Guidanz application
EmailTemplate.name: EVL_Guidanz_Application_Access
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Cummins Guidanz (Limited Release)!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!IAM_Contact_Provisioning__c.IAM_Contact_Name__c}, Your username {!IAM_Contact_Provisioning__c.IAM_Username__c}, has now been granted access to Dealer Guidanz. If you have used Guidanz Web in the past, you will be receiving a second email requesting you to setup a new password for your existing User ID in order to access the application. Please do so immediately to ensure you can access the system on your Go-Live date. If you have not used Guidanz Web in the past, you can use your existing Cummins credentials to login to the new Dealer Guidanz.
Please bookmark and use the below URL to login to Dealer Guidnaz:- https://dealerguidanz.cummins.com If you have any questions or concerns, please send an email to guidanz@cummins.com for assistance and mention you are a Guidanz Limited Release Location. This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
